Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.random

Random number generation.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FastNonThreadsafeRandom
    Drop-in replacement for Random, but not using atomic long seeds.
    RandomFactory
    RandomFactory is responsible for creating Random generator objects.
    XorShift1024NonThreadsafeRandom
    Replacement for Java's Random class, using a different random number generation strategy.
    XorShift64NonThreadsafeRandom
    Replacement for Java's Random class, using a different random number generation strategy.
